00022 #ifndef BLOCK_HANDLER_HPP
00023 #define BLOCK_HANDLER_HPP
00024 
00025 #include "callback.hpp"
00026 #include "constants.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace uStreamLib {
00029         /*
00030          * Forward declarations.
00031          */
00032         class BlockManager;
00033         class Block;
00034 
00040         class US_EXPORT BlockHandler : public CallBack {
00041         public:
00042                 friend class Block;
00043 
00047                 enum HandlerReturnValue { 
00048                 HSUCCESS = 0, 
00049                 HFAILURE = 1, 
00050                 HCRITICAL = 2 };
00051 
00056                 BlockHandler(Block* b, char* name);
00057 
00061                 virtual ~BlockHandler(void);
00062 
00067                 Block* getBlock(void)
00068                 {
00069                         return _block;
00070                 }
00071 
00076                 uint32 getCode(void)
00077                 {
00078                         return _code;
00079                 }
00080         protected:
00088                 virtual int32 perform(void)
00089                 {
00090                         return SUCCESS;
00091                 }
00092         private:
00093                 /* copy constructor not available */
00094                 BlockHandler(BlockHandler&)
00095                 {
00096                 }
00097 
00098                 /* the block this handler belongs to */
00099                 Block* _block;
00100 
00101                 /* the event or action code this callback wish to handle */
00102                 uint32 _code;
00103         };
00104 }
